title: 服务器会自动
author: Techxiu
txt_content:
服务器会自动重启导致玩家掉线
[09:47:47] [Server thread/INFO]: winter has just earned the achievement [Taking Inventory]
[09:47:50] [Thread-36/INFO]: UUID of player Jacklay43 is 9d3b1780-9ecc-3bab-8b47-c3722d441d82
[09:47:50] [Server thread/INFO]: [0;33;22m玩家[0;36;1mJacklay43[0;33;22m登陆了游戏！[m
[09:47:50] [Server thread/INFO]: Jacklay43[/104.172.34.149:52120] logged in with entity id 31826 at ([world]990.7872975404879, 74.8844274234311, 611.8617970674326)
[09:47:51] [Server thread/INFO]: /119.166.143.121:52874 lost connection: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: An internal error occured.
[09:47:53] [Async Chat Thread - #0/INFO]: [m[0;32;22m【市民】luo_luo[m 做家[m
[09:47:57] [Server thread/INFO]: /119.166.143.121:52885 lost connection: Internal Exception: io.netty.handler.codec.DecoderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: An internal error occured.

replies.author: Techxiu
replies.txt_content: 在linux下运行，一会就自动重启
